posts.post_content: It's very effective in draft, especially against red. I always just looked right past it until tonight, and i was very impressed. It's well out of burn range and red hates life gain. I dropped two of these, then went about my business while my opponent had to wait for heat ray and nine mana. I won the game while he was waiting. 8 toughness is sweet.
posts.html:

posts.post_content: It's rated low because life gain is generally a poor strategy and because tapping creatures to gain life means losing them to defend against the loss of life on your opponents next turn.
